Description: Please make sure to read the entire listing. Almost all of out merchandises are pre-owned vintage items. Describing the condition of an item is very subjective to individuals I try my best describe items for customers. However, impressions may vary from person to person as well as color may vary from monitor to monitor. If there is a particular angle and you are unsure about something just let me know and I will answer to your all questions to help you make your own judgment on the condition. If there is a problem with an item you purchased, please contact us BEFORE you leave a feedback. We will try our best to resolve the issues. Your satisfaction is the most important to us!!! Temple length: 5" Frame widths: 5'1/2 inches Lens height: 1"5/8 The sunglasses are in very good condition. Absolutely stunning pair of vintage glasses by the inimitable Emmanuel Khanh. Hand made in France and trimmed with lux python skin. The item “EMMANUELLE KHANH Paris France Hand Made Python Trim Glasses Eyeglasses VINTAGE” Please make the payment within 7 days. I accept all forms of payment through PayPal. If there is a delay in payment, let me know. I ship 6 days a week, the next day after payment is received. I am always happy to make combined shipping on multiple orders, in order to save my customers money. I ship only to confirmed addresses. INTERNATIONAL BUYERS The item will be shipped the next day after your payment is being made. As there is no trucking number with USPS FIRST CLASS international mail I will ship the item through USPS PRIORITY MAIL. USPS delivers your item to you by the specified time. It depends on the service. However, please understand USPS sometimes takes a while to deliver your item to you which is out of my control. If there is a delay in shipping, please contact me. I will investigate. When you purchase the item I assume you are okay with everything. Otherwise contact me. RETURN POLICY Please review my listings and check if we accept or do not accept returns on the specific item. If the return is accepted, the item must be returned within the 14 days after receiving it. If you would like to return your purchase for any reason within 14 days, you will be refunded the purchase price of the product after it will be delivered to me. Buyers pay shipping. The item must be returned in the same condition! FEEDBACK Your feedback is the key to my success. Please provide feedback so we rest assured that you received your item. Feedback is taken very seriously to me. If you are not happy in any way about the item, please contact me. I will do everything possible to make sure you are 100% satisfied with your purchase.
